oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Tamme (XII)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The song of the ||gani (a kind of woodpigeon). 1) See also The song of the !na !na'rishe (a bird) and The song of the !korro-ssin !ku (or Pit-making Bushmen) and A song of the |kam-ssin !ku (or Sun Bushmen) and Song of the ||ku and Song of the !kan ||ka ||karashe and The song of the Sauko and The song of the ||noruko djo-djo and The song of the mother of the little buck and The song of the ≠na≠n'arro and The song of the Ngogan-a (a little bird) and The song of the !ke tsa'ba (a bird) and The lion's song, 2) This is found in Book XI & XII-3.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd !kun notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The song of the ||gani (a bird)
